message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.CL. 

This paper describes a system of deep neural networks (DNNs) that perform a sequence of machine learning tasks. The paper is focused on the architecture of the DNNs and how they can be trained to learn new tasks without forgetting previously learned ones. This is a common problem in machine learning, and the paper proposes a solution using progressive neural networks. 

Based on this description, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). Other likely sub-categories include cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), cs.CV (Computer Vision), and cs.CL (Computation and Language). These sub-categories are all relevant to the topic of machine learning and neural networks, and they cover different aspects of the research presented in the paper.
